  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FareCalculatorTests, LocationTests, NotificationTest, OfflineTests, RequestTest, SearchingTests, StatusTests, TestDataGenerator, UserTest

    public class ApplicationTest
extends android.test.ApplicationTestCase<android.app.Application>
    Testing Fundamentals All tests extend ApplicationTest. The following is a list of test cases representing use cases. If you receive the "no tests in suite" error, check that you have an instrumentation runner set up (click the drop down between Make Project (hammer button) and Run (play button), click Edit Configurations, and you should see the text box for the option. Request Tests =================================================================================== US 01.01.01 [request a ride]: (proof of backend) US 01.02.01 [see current requests] : (proof of backend)
    See Also:
    US 01.03.01 [offer recieved notification], US 01.04.01 [rider cancelling a request], US 01.06.01 [Calculate a fair fare], US 01.07.01 [Confirm completion and pay] : (proof of backend), US 01.08.01 [Confirm driver], US 01.09.01 [See driver's vehicle] : (proof of backend), Status ========================================================================================== US 02.01.01 [see status of request] : (proof of backend), UserProfile ===================================================================================== US 03.01.01 [Unique username and contact info], US 03.02.01 [Edit own contact info], US 03.03.01 [See contact info of user] (proof of backend), US 03.04.01 [Provide vehicle details] (proof of backend), Searching ======================================================================================= US 04.01.01 [Browse reqeusts by geo-location], US 04.02.01 [Browse by keyword], US 04.03.01, US 04.04.01 [see addresses of requests] : (proof of backend) US 04.05.01 [search by address] : (proof of backend), SearchingTests, Accepting ======================================================================================= US 05.01.01 [Accept a request as a driver], RequestTest.testRequestStatus(), US 05.02.01 [View pending offers as driver], US 05.03.01 [See if acceptance was accepted] : (proof of backend), RequestTest.testRequestStatus(), US 05.04.01 [Notification when offer was accepted], Offline behavior ================================================================================ US 08.01.01 [I want see requests I accepted while offline], US 08.02.01 [See requests made while offline], t US 08.03.01 [make requests offline] : (proof of backend), US 08.04.01 [make offers offline] : (proof of backend), Location ======================================================================================== US 10.01.01 [Specify on map for request] : (proof of backend), US 10.02.01 [View start and end for request] : (proof of backend), SearchingTests
